statements: UPDATE user_fitness_data SET weight = 70.5 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_fitness_data SET activity_level = 'active' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_fitness_data SET target_calories = 2000, target_exercise = 'Running' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_fitness_data SET weight = 70.5, height = 170.2 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_fitness_data SET age = 30, weight = 72.3, target_calories = 2000, target_exercise = 'Running' WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
UPDATE user_fitness_data SET activity_level = 'active', target_calories = 2500 WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE User SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = '3f7949d9-2f92-4c3c-ae4c-51aae8c7909f';
UPDATE FitnessLog SET steps = 10000 WHERE log_id = '0dcea2e0-6c2c-48a3-990b-b6312b10b1cb';
UPDATE FitnessRecommendations SET recommendation = 'Increase cardio exercises' WHERE recommendation_id = 'bfd79157-5591-45f2-91f7-336f00489246';
UPDATE User SET age = age + 1, weight = weight - 5 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE FitnessLog SET steps = steps + 100, calories_burned = calories_burned + 200 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND date = '2022-10-15';

UPDATE FitnessRecommendations SET recommendation = 'Try a new workout routine' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND recommendation_type = 'Fitness' AND recommendation_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 'abcd-1234';
UPDATE user_activities SET duration = 60 WHERE activity_id = 'xyz-5678';
UPDATE user_preferences SET fitness_level = 'Intermediate' WHERE user_id = 'pqr-9012';
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE age < 30;
UPDATE user_activities SET duration = duration + 10, calories_burned = calories_burned * 1.2 WHERE activity_type = 'Cardio';
UPDATE user_preferences SET goal = 'Weight Loss', preferred_activities = ARRAY['Running', 'Cycling'] WHERE fitness_level = 'Intermediate';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE fitness_activities SET duration_min = 45 WHERE activity_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_fitness_goals SET target_calories_burned = 2000 WHERE user_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE users SET age=30, weight=75.5 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE fitness_activities SET duration_min=60, calories_burned=400.0 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_fitness_goals SET target_calories_burned=500.0 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 'f66cb245-81c3-4d12-b374-dfd4f5c53962';
UPDATE activities SET calories_burned = 200, duration_minutes = 60 WHERE activity_id = '13863704-97ba-4d86-8cda-897dd46fa1e1';
UPDATE workouts SET intensity_level = 'High', duration_minutes = 45 WHERE workout_id = '0a5fba6d-8f68-432f-9b9a-629d419ca524';
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE activities SET duration_minutes = 60, calories_burned = 300 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE meals SET protein = 25, carbs = 30, fats = 15 WHERE meal_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
